About

I'm Steven. I'm a senior at Rice studying CS.


I enjoy creating and designing things. I'm currently looking for new grad positions starting 2023 for full stack/SWE. If you'd like to reach out, please feel free to email me or connect with me on LinkedIn. Meanwhile, I hope you enjoy looking around.


Work

Frontend Developer

CyberCube

In Summer 2021, I worked with CyberCube, a cyber risk analytics startup in SF. I implemented a system to gather time and usage metrics for CyberCube's CMS software and transformed the data into visualizable graphs for user admins using AWS Quicksight.

More Info
Full Stack Developer

Kopis Mobile

I worked on BASE and SCOUT, content management apps used to maintain security best practices and perform assessments. My contributions included building the apps and improving the UX, as well as converting them to a responsive design.

More Info
Web Developer

CaseCtrl

In summer 2020, I worked with CaseCtrl, a medical startup automating surgery scheduling. It was my first internship experience and I got to learn a bit of ASP.NET through exploring the frontend and backend of the CaseCtrl application.

More Info
Game Designer, Artist, and UI Programmer

BLOP

BLOP is a physics-based strategy game where you build the highest block tower within the time limit. This was my first game jam project; the jam was Ludum Dare 49 and the theme was "unstable".

Play it here :D
Game Designer, Programmer, Artist

andrew is bored

andrew is bored is a platformer that I built with some friends. It has both puzzle and platforming built into it - you control a character who moves around by dashing through blocks of light and dark.

Play it here :D
Web Designer

Portfolio Site

After eons of procrastination, I made a website. This site was created from scratch using the holy trinity. The floating astronaut was something I came up with after I scrapped two older designs.
